name: .GCI
summary: Learn about .GCI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a GCI file in Dolphin (cross-platform). To do so, you must possess a corresponding American-edition GameCube ROM, which will likely be saved in a .GCM or .ISO file.

To load your GCI file, first use Dolphin's Memory Card Manager to add the file to your list of GameCube saved games. Then, open the GCI file's corresponding ROM and load the saved game your GCI file contains.
